Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. "I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's "State of the Union" program today.
